attributes.action: All future Immigrants to speak English and respect this being a christian country. To abide by our laws even if against their own culture and beliefs.
attributes.additional_details: The Government of the UK has for a number of years bent over backwards to make immigrants feel at home to the detriment of its citizens. This is a christian country and as such we should be free from claims of  racism. The laws of this country are for ALL citizens regardless of race or religion. Ensure ALL Immagrants speak fluent English, swear an oath of loyalty to the UK and the crown.Any criminal conviction will result in immediate deportation to country of origin for him/herself and all dependents.
